#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,s;
    int a,b,c;
    int x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3;
    cin >> s >>t;
    if(s==1)
    {
        while(t--)
        {
            cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2 >> x3 >> y3;
            a = (x2-x1)*(x2-x1) + (y2-y1)*(y2-y1);
            b = (x3-x2)*(x3-x2) + (y2-y3)*(y2-y3);
            c = (x3-x1)*(x3-x1) + (y3-y1)*(y3-y1);
            if(a==b || a==c || b==c)
            {
                cout << "Isosceles triangle\n";
            }
            else
                cout << "Scalene  triangle\n";
        }
    }
    else
    {
        while(t--)
        {
            cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2 >> x3 >> y3;
            a = (x2-x1)*(x2-x1) + (y2-y1)*(y2-y1);
            b = (x3-x2)*(x3-x2) + (y2-y3)*(y2-y3);
            c = (x3-x1)*(x3-x1) + (y3-y1)*(y3-y1);
            if(a==b || a==c || b==c)
            {
                cout << "Isosceles ";
            }
            else
                cout << "Scalene ";
            if(a>b)
            {
                if(a>c)
                {
                    if(a==b+c)
                        cout << "right ";
                    else if(a>b+c)
                        cout << "obtuse ";
                    else //if(a<b+c)
                        cout << "acute ";
                }
                else
                {
                    if(c==b+a)
                        cout << "right ";
                    else if(c>b+a)
                        cout << "obtuse ";
                    else //if(c<b+a)
                        cout << "acute ";
                }
            }
            else if(b>a)
            {
                if(b>c)
                {
                    if(b==a+c)
                        cout << "right ";
                    else if(b>a+c)
                        cout << "obtuse ";
                    else //if(b<a+c)
                        cout << "acute ";
                }
                else
                {
                    if(c==b+a)
                        cout << "right ";
                    else if(c>b+a)
                        cout << "obtuse ";
                    else //if(c<b+a)
                        cout << "acute ";
                }
            }
            else
            {
                if(a>c)
                    cout << "acute ";
                else
                {
                    if(c==a+b)
                        cout << "right ";
                    else
                        cout << "obtuse ";
                }
            }
            cout << "triangle\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
